behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote_control: item, dvd_player: item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        achieve close(remote_control, dvd_player)
        achieve facing_char(char, dvd_player)
        touch(remote_control)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            id[remote_control] == 2052
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote_control, dvd_player)

behavior turn_on_dvd_with_remote(remote:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote) 
        achieve close_char(char, dvd_player)
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) 

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and inside(remote, home_office_319)
        bind dvd_player: item where:
